title: New: North Bay – Echo
content:
It’s clear from the off that Oxford’s Tom Jenkinson aka North Bay is no slacker.

Having released his debut track, the scintillating Breath only a couple of days back, he’s dropped another ambient masterpiece in the form of Echo. Clocking in at over five minutes, Echo is a stunning journey, through hymnal-esque vocals and perfectly timed handclaps. What makes this track even more wonderful is it’s reassuring self-belief, despite it’s fragile elements. Check out Echo below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
